Class WriteToFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • WriteToFile

  • public class WriteToFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This takes a map, and player name and saves the current state of the map saved as PlayerName.txt
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Nathan Preston

        name - the Username
        AI - All the AI of that map
        levelNum - The level number
        p - The player

      • levelToString

        public java.lang.String levelToString(Map m,
                                      Player p)
        Takes in a map, draws an ASCII version. Then calls detailsToString to get the map details
        Parameters:
        m - the current map
        p - the player
        Returns:
        String format of the current map

      • detailsToString

        public java.lang.String detailsToString(Map m,
                                        java.lang.String inSave,
                                        Player p)
        Takes in the current map and finds any items/doors/teleporters and adds the specific details
        Parameters:
        m - current map
        inSave - the String passed from levelToString, to update
        p - the player
        Returns:
        the updated string from levelToString, including map details
